Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-7656 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-7656 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-8, affected by CVE-2025-7656
